BJJI.title: BJJ Insight
BJJI.description: Mobile application connecting Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu practitioners with high-level athletes, available on iOS and Android. The platform allows practitioners to ask all their questions directly to the athletes of their choice. A landing page presents the application, its features, and facilitates downloading from the stores. The application integrates a messaging system and secure transactions.

traiteurcreole.title: Passion créole
traiteurcreole.description: Showcase website for an Antillean caterer in Île-de-France, specializing in events. The site presents catering services, proposed menus, and allows clients to discover authentic Creole cuisine. A dedicated section highlights services for weddings, seminars, and other events. The site also offers a contact form for personalized quotes.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Personal portfolio developed with Next.js and TypeScript, showcasing my projects and skills. The site follows a mobile-first approach and uses SCSS for styling. It integrates the WakaTime API to display my real-time development statistics as well as an API for mail service. Deployment is automated via GitHub Actions and hosted on Vercel.

process.title: Process
process.description: Website for my former Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu club in Nantes. The site presents class schedules, pricing, and various activities offered by the club. It also allows visitors to discover the sport and the club's philosophy. The site was developed with simple and efficient technologies to ensure easy maintenance by club members.

bar.title: Aux plaisirs démodes
bar.description: Showcase website developed for a bar in Rennes. The site was created with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, integrating the Google Maps API for location. A continuous deployment system was set up via GitHub to facilitate updates.

touchdown.title: get-touchdown
touchdown.description: E-commerce landing page developed for get-touchdown with a creative and eye-catching design, emphasizing user experience through animations and visual effects. Developed with Next.js and deployed on Vercel with a CI/CD pipeline. Integration of the Stripe payment system for transaction processing.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Don't hesitate to contact me for any questions or project proposals. I will respond as soon as possible.
contact.data: By submitting this form, you consent to the collection and storage of the submitted data for the purpose of processing your contact request.

bjjinsight.title: Owner
bjjinsight.description: Creation of a sports service application dedicated to Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu. Full-stack development of an innovative platform for the BJJ community.

capgemini.title: Full-stack Developer
capgemini.description: As a Java developer at Capgemini in Nantes, I participated in the development and maintenance of enterprise applications, using the latest technologies and agile methodologies.

einden.title: Web Developer
einden.description: Creation and integration of websites connected to software via API. Development of custom features and maintenance of existing web applications.

avancenet.title: Web Developer
avancenet.description: Development of a showcase website with Drupal CMS. Implementation of custom features and integration of dynamic content.
